div.div: 创建AlertSchedulePool线程池缓存到AlertPoolPolicy#LEVEL_POOL_MAP，高、中、低分别对应一个线程池。后续从缓存获取线程池

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 531px; margin-left: 47px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
AlertSchedulePool#autoPutTask
提交任务到线程池，定时执行，执行间隔是每个alertplan的间隔

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 706px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 缓存k->AlertPlanId, value->ScheduledFuture到AlertTaskContainer#CACHE_TICKET，该缓存用于取消任务

div.div: 告警计划的变动，如禁用、修改、删除、添加等

div.div:
取消告警任务的执行
ScheduleManager#cancel

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 521px; margin-left: 617px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
告警是开启状态，添加告警任务执行
ScheduleManager#put

div.div:
告警取消
